entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for May 13, 2024
The Far Side comic 2 for May 13, 2024

summary.caption: “One more thing, young man. You get my daughter home before sunrise—I don’t want you coming back here with a pile of dried bones!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for May 13, 2024

summary.caption: “Say … what’s a mountain goat doing way up here in a cloud bank?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for May 13, 2024

summary.caption: “Oh, Professor DeWitt! Have you seen Professor Weinberg’s time machine? … It’s digital!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for May 13, 2024

summary.caption: The conversation had been brisk and pleasant when, suddenly and simultaneously, everyone just got dog tired.
